title.narrative: WASH IN INSTITUTIONS

description.narrative: Education and health systems in selected districts have enhanced capacity and provide sustainable, inclusive Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) services in schools andhealth facilities., which contributes to Sanitation, Sanitation (Covid), Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Vulnerable groups have increased access to safe and affordable water supply, sanitation, and hygiene

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Education and health systems in selected districts have enhanced capacity and provide sustainable, inclusive WASH services in schools andhealth facilities.

description.narrative: Health and education sector systems were strengthened through assessments and improvements to data management for WASH in institutions thereby facilitating enhanced planning and scale up of service delivery for children in schools and healthcare facilities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/01/2020
